        localizes and comes back

      • setRobotSpeed

        public static void setRobotSpeed()
        Sets the robot speed. Internally sets the speed and the acceleration of the robot

      • passBlackLine

        public static void passBlackLine​(boolean isBridge)
        Takes a sample of both the left and right light sensors. Sets the values of @param prevLeftColour and @param prevRightColour

      • moveIntoPosition

        public static void moveIntoPosition​(boolean isBridge)
        Sets the robot into position (AT the 1, 1 position) after hitting the first line. Also updates odometer.

      • setSpeed

        public static void setSpeed​(int speed)
        Sets the speed of both motors to the same values.
        Parameters:
        speed - the speed in degrees per second

      • setSpeeds

        public static void setSpeeds​(int leftSpeed,
                             int rightSpeed)
        Sets the speed of both motors to different values.
        Parameters:
        leftSpeed - the speed of the left motor in degrees per second
        rightSpeed - the speed of the right motor in degrees per second

      • setAcceleration

        public static void setAcceleration​(int acceleration)
        Sets the acceleration of both motors.
        Parameters:
        acceleration - the acceleration in degrees per second squared

      • turnBy

        public static void turnBy​(double angle)
        turns the left and right motor by a specific angle. Angle is converted to a distance internally
        Parameters:
        angle -

        public static boolean isRed​(double prevColour,
                            double colour)

      • isGreen

        public static boolean isGreen​(double prevColour,
                              double colour)
        Parameters:
        prevColour - first color reading
        colour - second color reading
        Returns:
        true if green false if not

      • readFloorColour

        public static void readFloorColour​(java.lang.String color)
        The method fills up an leftColor array and rightColor array with the floor color values
        Parameters:
        color - takes in the default color
